labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: You don't get moved at all - regardless of permissions
data.expected_result: Once the idle time is reached, the user should be moved to the AFK channel
data.short_description: Users are not moved to AFK Channel
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a server with 2 or more voice channels - Set the servers AFK timeout to whatever time you want, to keep things simple set it to 1 min - Join another voice channel that is not the AFK channel - Sit completely idle and observe.
